title: Ban
body:
Hi, to who it may concern,
I was playing a ranked game, and the connection went off for just 30 seconds. I entered the app in order to reconnect and when i signed in i was back to level 1, no champions, no skins, nothing. I entered my account on another computer and it worked, but i got a 20 min ban. Can you please remove it ? because i do not deserve it.
Thank you, Madjam

replies.body: It sounds like you were away from your match for long enough to acquire a [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ).  Logging into the friends app on your phone doesn't bypass this, because you're not actually participating in the match.  The lower priority queue only happens after more than just 1 leave as well, so let me know if I you're having any technical issues that I could assist with!
20min Ban is Not the first punishment you Mist have had leaverbuster before. Riot does Not remove que punishments you will have to play through the games.
